input_text:
Job Title: Project Manager (Drywall / Framing)

Location: Dallas, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Position Overview: The Project Manager (Drywall / Framing) is responsible for managing the execution of all drywall and framing projects and ensuring that they are completed on time and within budget. The Project Manager will also manage vendor relationships, monitor project progress, and provide feedback to the team.

Key Responsibilities

Develop and implement project plans and track project progress.Manage and coordinate all drywall and framing projects.Maintain relationships with vendors and subcontractors.Ensure that projects are completed on time and within budget.Provide regular updates on project progress to the team.Keep informed about new developments in drywall and framing technology.Recognize potential red flags and take appropriate action to prevent problems.

Qualifications

Minimum 5 years of experience in Project Management.Strong knowledge of drywall and framing techniques.Experience in Commercial Construction Management.Experience working with Procore, Bluebeam, and Microsoft Project.Experience in Interior Finishing and Interior Renovations.Experience in School Construction is preferred.Excellent organizational and communication skills.

Benefits

Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Geoffrey.Browning@CyberCoders.com

Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : GB2-1796196 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***

Geoffrey Browning - Recruiter - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, status as a crime victim, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. CyberCoders will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. CyberCoders is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you need special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please contact a member of our Human Resources team to make arrangements.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
